mapper.select: SELECT re.review_no,u.useremail,ds.designer_id,d.dog_id,re.review_title,re.review_content,re.review_photo,re.review_date FROM review re INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id =d.dog_id INNER JOIN user u ON re.useremail =u.useremail INNER JOIN designer ds ON re.designer_id =ds.designer_id
SELECT * FROM review WHERE useremail like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%');
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_title=#{review_title}, review_content=#{review_content}, review_photo=#{review_photo} WHERE useremail=#{useremail}
mapper.select: SELECT * from review WHERE review_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY ) AND NOW();
